description.@en: Look at this scar, right down the middle of my palm! It’s nasty, isn’t it? Ever since I suffered it, I’ve become a bit of a Nervous Nellie.

system.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: Whenever you suffer from Stress, Fear or Terror, you immediately drop whatever you are holding. In addition, when you suffer from Bleeding or an Injury, you must succeed a Toughness Test or else drop what you’re holding.
